title: How to rotate the canvas in Sketchbook Autodesk for Windows 10 - Quora

response.answer_text: Select either Flip Canvas Vertically or Mirror Canvas to rotate the image 180 degrees. For users of active tablets, such as a Cintiq, with a pixel width of less than 1024, we currently only support Landscape mode. The toolbar was designed for devices with a minimum 1024 pixels width.  Source: autodesk forums

If You are using a touch screen you place two fingers and twist. You may need to enable it in the settings and if you have performance issues they recommend you deactivate it. If you're not using it with a touch screen you'll need to use a keyboard shortcut. Look in the help menu.
